page.title: 05BADMINTON HORSE TRIALS.
page.content: The Three Day Event at Badminton is famous world-wide. The first day is the DRESSAGE.The horse has to perform 20 movements. There is a maximum number of 240 points.The competitor has to perform the test from memory. The second day is the SPEED and ENDURANCE.This consists four separate phases:Roads and Tracks.(4400 metres) Steeplechase. (3105 metres) Roads and Tracks.(9900 metres) Cross-Country. (7065 metres) There is one rest of ten minutes for a veterinary inspection. The third day is the JUMPING.There 10 to 12 obstacles over a distane of about 750 metres. Three day eventing is now a well established event.Many local people are employed as helpers at this event.
